htmlBody: CGP Grey is great! I'm also a fan of exurb1a's channel, they have many videos with EA-adjacent themes. This one sticks out to me as moving EA content: https://youtu.be/n__42UNIhvU

I hadn't come across this fable before, but found it really interesting. I thought it nicely introduced several of EA's common topics about choosing how to do the most good and convincing others about issues worthy of prioritizing. Thanks for sharing!
I find exurb1a a bit too nihilistic.. the creator has also been accused of highly abusive behavior, so I feel iffy about the channel. (Sorry, no time to search the link for you)

Engaging and moving EA content:

  • Letter from Utopia
  • Replacing Guilt series, especially Not Yet Gods
  • The Precipice
  • Against neutrality about creating happy lives. Save this for a rainy day. It's the most life affirming piece ever.
